DOC.brief_title: A Study Atezolizumab Combination With Nab-Paclitaxel Compared With Placebo With Nab-Paclitaxel Participants With Previously Untreated Metastatic Triple-Negative Breast Cancer ( IMpassion130 )
DOC.criteria: Metastatic locally advance , histologically document TNBC characterize absence human epidermal growth factor 2 ( HER2 ) , estrogen receptor ( ER ) , progesterone receptor ( PR ) expression No prior chemotherapy targeted systemic therapy inoperable locally advanced metastatic TNBC Eligible taxane monotherapy ( i.e. , absence rapid clinical progression , lifethreatening visceral metastasis , need rapid symptom and/or disease control ) A representative formalinfixed , paraffinembedded tumor specimen paraffin block , least 20 unstained slide associated pathology report document ER , PR , HER2 negativity .
